FuncDef:
The clock command sets the clock mode of a port extension interface.
The undo clock command restores the default setting.
By default, a port extension interface works in master clock mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures a port extension interface to work in master clock mode.
-

Configures a port extension interface to work in slave clock mode.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When interfaces on two Routers are directly connected, one interface must be configured to work in master clock mode and use internal clock signals, and the other interface must be configured to work in slave clock mode and use line clock signals.
Precautions
Link flapping may occur if the clock works in improper mode.
